sentences.sContent: ...without access to any services such as water or sewerage.
sentences.sCn: ...不能享受任何如供水或污水处理的服务。

phrases.pCn: 排水系统；污水工程系统

words.tran: 为…铺设污水管道；用下水道排除…的污水

trans.tranCn: 排水系统； 污水处理； 污水
trans.tranOther: the system by which waste material and used water are carried away in sewers and then treated to stop it being harmful
